articles.title: Matteo Berrettini Defeats Andy Murray To Win Stuttgart Title - ATP Tour
articles.description: Matteo Berrettini capped his return to Tour by winning his first tour-level title of the season Sunday, overcoming former World No. 1 Andy Murray 6-4, 5-7, 6-3 in the BOSS OPEN final.
